description:

提升使用者敏捷并增加10%命中率；
name: 风灵魔戒
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 饰品>
<Text Color: 17>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FFFF00>
<ZzySCF Color: #FFFF00>

<ZzyYEC Eq Start>
user._precise = user._precise || 0;
user._precise += 50;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(1000, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC Eq End>

<ZzyYEC UnEq Start>
user._precise = user._precise || 0;
user._precise -= 50;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(1000, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC UnEq End>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
    item 103: 2
    item 104: 1
    item 101: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>

\c[9]“这个疲惫的灵魂终于可以休息了”\c[0]
name: 希尔妲的执念
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 18>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FF0000>
<Passive State: 264>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
   if (user.actorId() == 3) {
     condition = false;
   } else {
     condition = ture;
   }
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>

description:
受到所有伤害（包括真实伤害）时，消耗MP抵挡伤害的20%
每1点MP抵挡8点伤害，但这一效果在MP小于100点时不生效
name: 魔力屏障
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 27>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FF00FF>
<Passive State: 311>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
   if (user.actorId() == 10) {
     condition = false;
   } else {
     condition = ture;
   }
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>

description:
+20 TP上限，根据当前等级和TP量提升普通攻击伤害，TP 大于
60点时，根据TP和魔法攻击每回合获得护盾，但受伤会损失TP
name: 狂热旌旗
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 18>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FF0000>
<Passive State: 312>
<ZzyYEC ExMTp: 20>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
   if (user.isStateAffected(313) ||
       user.isStateAffected(314) ) {
     condition = false;
   } else {
     condition = ture;
   }
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>

description:
+20 敏捷
每20点\c[3]敏捷\c[0]提升1%\c[17]闪避率\c[0]和\c[17]魔法闪避率\c[0]
name: 真实敏捷
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 17>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FFFF00>

<SF_CustomBlessBasic eva>
return Math.min(0.4, Math.floor(actor.agi/10)/100);
</SF_CustomBlessBasic eva>

<SF_CustomBlessBasic mev>
return Math.min(0.4, Math.floor(actor.agi/10)/100);
</SF_CustomBlessBasic mev>

description:
普通攻击伤害增加，增加量为目标当前生命8%，受敌方防御和自身穿透
以及相关系数影响，这一伤害增加效果会被\c[17]\it[213]\c[0]抵消
name: 破灭余晖
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 27>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FF00FF>
<Passive State: 327>

description:
槐诗灵魂武装的仿制品，+20TP上限
每4点TP增加1%暴击率, 与\c[27]\ia[59]\c[0]不兼容
name: 愤怒之斧
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 17>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FFFF00>
<Passive State: 313>
<ZzyYEC ExMTp: 20>

<SF_CustomBlessBasic cri>
return Math.ceil(actor.tp/4)/100;
</SF_CustomBlessBasic cri>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
   if (user.isStateAffected(312)) {
     condition = false;
   } else {
     condition = ture;
   }
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>

description:
槐诗灵魂武装的仿制品，受伤时增加TP，每3点TP增加2点攻击力，和
1.5%物理攻击附加\c[18]\it[251]\c[0]的概率，与\c[27]\ia[59]\c[0]不兼容

note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 17>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FFFF00>
<Passive State: 314>

<SF_CustomBlessBasic atk>

</SF_CustomBlessBasic atk>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>

description:
+25% \c[18]物理吸血\c[0] 受到高于当前生命30%的伤害时，
下回合攻击吸血量增加50%，不可叠加
name: 嗜血者的咆哮
note:
<Not Independent Item>
<Menu Category: 天赋石>
<Text Color: 27>
<ZzyGIT TextColor: #FF00FF>
<Passive State: 336>

<ZzyYEC Eq Start>
user._absrate = user._absrate || 0;
user._pbsrate = user._pbsrate || 0;
user._mbsrate = user._mbsrate || 0;
user._pbsrate += 0.25;
user._pbsrate = Math.max(user._pbsrate, 0);
<ZzyYEC Eq End>

<ZzyYEC UnEq Start>
user._absrate = user._absrate || 0;
user._pbsrate = user._pbsrate || 0;
user._mbsrate = user._mbsrate || 0;
user._pbsrate -= 0.25;
user._pbsrate = Math.max(user._pbsrate, 0);
<ZzyYEC UnEq End>

user._precise += 100;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(500, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC Eq End>

user._precise -= 100;
user._precise = Math.max(0, user._precise);
user._precise = Math.min(500, user._precise);
<ZzyYEC UnEq End>
